statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5 , 40 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} + x + 30 , -6 \, x^{3} + x - 4 , 16 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x + 14 , -54 \, x^{3} + 30 \, x^{2} - 14 \, x - 46\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
